entry.title: VANGELO Women Slip Resistant Shoe AVA-2 Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: VANGELO PROFESSIONAL FOOTWEAR
Type: Women Slip Resistant Shoe
Price: 40.00

  • Professional Slip Resistant Shoes made per ASTM Industry Standard - The White House Chefs Endorsed Sponsor Kitchen Shoes, and the American Podiatric Medical Association Recommend Professional Footwear for Better Foot Health Products.
  • Genuine Leather and Breathable Mesh Material Upper. Inspired by Performance Slip On Athletic Styles, with Addition of Slip Resistance and Ventilated Lightweight Design, We Make Every Step Easier.
  • Non-Marking Rubber Sole. US Patent No.D808624, Special Designed Shape and Pattern to enable Units to Channel Fluids and Penetrate Hard Slick Surfaces to Increase Ability to Resist Slipping.
  • Ortholite Removable Insoles are Supportive and Comfortable for Long Time Stand and Walk Work.
  • Full Size Range From 5 to 13 US Women Size, Available for Both Medium and Wide Width.
